pages.text: The ME Storage Monitor is a simple way to see the current level of a specified item. There are several interactions to modify it.$(br2)$(l)Rightclick with item$()$(br)Will display the current level of that item if not locked.$(br)$(l)Rightclick with hand$()$(br)Will reset the display if not locked.$(br)$(l)Rightclick with wrench$()$(br)Will toggle the lock.
